subject: Implement porter skill with plugin selection wizard
description:
Create the main porter skill at `claude/port-tools/skills/plugin-porter/SKILL.md` with the plugin selection wizard as the first workflow phase.

The porter skill is the orchestrator for the entire conversion workflow (similar to `create-spec` or `feature-dev`). This task focuses on:

1. **YAML Frontmatter**: Define skill metadata
   - name: plugin-porter
   - description: Convert Agent Alchemy plugins to other AI coding platforms
   - model: opus (orchestration/synthesis task)
   - user-invocable: true
   - allowed-tools: Read, Glob, Grep, Write, AskUserQuestion, Task, WebSearch, WebFetch
   - argument-hint: Target platform name (e.g., "opencode")

2. **Phase 1 - Target Platform Selection**:
   - Accept target platform as argument or prompt via AskUserQuestion
   - Validate adapter file exists for the target platform
   - Load adapter file from `references/adapters/{platform}.md`

3. **Phase 2 - Plugin Selection Wizard**:
   - Read `claude/.claude-plugin/marketplace.json` to enumerate available plugin groups
   - Display all groups (core-tools, dev-tools, sdd-tools, tdd-tools, git-tools) with component counts
   - Use AskUserQuestion for group-level multi-selection
   - For selected groups, scan for individual components (skills, agents, hooks, references, MCP configs)
   - Use AskUserQuestion for component-level multi-selection
   - Display brief descriptions for informed selection

Follow the phase workflow pattern with `"CRITICAL: Complete ALL phases"` directive used in deep-analysis and tdd-cycle.

**Acceptance Criteria:**

_Functional:_
- [ ] SKILL.md has valid YAML frontmatter with all required fields
- [ ] Accepts target platform as skill argument
- [ ] Reads marketplace.json to enumerate plugin groups
- [ ] Displays all 5 plugin groups with component counts and descriptions
- [ ] Supports group-level multi-selection via AskUserQuestion
- [ ] Supports component-level multi-selection within selected groups
- [ ] Scans for all component types: skills, agents, hooks, references, MCP configs
- [ ] Loads the correct adapter file for the selected target platform

_Edge Cases:_
- [ ] Handles empty plugin group (no components): skips with message
- [ ] Handles "select all" at group level
- [ ] Handles unknown target platform (no adapter file): error with suggestion

_Error Handling:_
- [ ] Clear error if marketplace.json not found
- [ ] Clear error if adapter file not found for target platform

**Testing Requirements:**
• Manual: Verify SKILL.md validates against skill frontmatter schema
• Manual: Test selection wizard flow with different group/component combinations
• Manual: Verify component discovery finds all types in existing plugin groups

Source: internal/specs/plugin-porting-SPEC.md Section 5.1, 5.8, 9.2
